climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: GEL ENHANCED SEAT CUSHION - If you want premium high-density memory foam plus gel, our pick is the Gel Enhanced Seat Cushion. The memory foam is durable, comfortable, and long-lasting while the gel prevents the cushion from feeling too hot. A soft, machine-washable short plush cover makes it easy to keep clean. Non-slip rubber dots on the bottom means it won't slide out of your chair as you shift around

QUITE PORTABLE CHAIR CUSHION - The carrying handle makes it easy to move from seat to seat and it's perfectly sized for a work chair or use in a wheelchair. Great for office, home, travel, car seat or wheelchair use. You can even use it outdoors, but the cover isn't waterproof, so save it for dry weather

ERGONOMIC "U" SHAPED CUTOUT DESIGN - Whether you're working from home, sitting in an office chair, a car or truck, or any kind of seat at all, the U-shaped cutout for your tailbone is specifically designed to maximize comfort and support while reducing pressure on your tailbone. The CYLEN office chair cushion can make your day more enjoyable and keep away those aches and pains

IT’S A COMMON BYPRODUCT OF FATIGUE - You might slouch or begin leaning forward at an uncomfortable angle at your desk, and you might not even register the discomfort right away because your mind is intently elsewhere. This comfort seat cushion features ergonomic design to help soothe already-existing aches and pains that came about after months or even years of slouching and leaning

TIPS - Since it’s made of high-density memory foam, keep in mind that the firmness of the cushion can be affected by temperature fluctuations. Especially in cold weather, many users mention removing the cushion from the car; otherwise, it can become firm and hard and won’t return to its soft, supportive state until the material warms up again

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WHY CAN WE CREATE THE TOP1 RATING COCCYX SEAT CUSHION IN THE MARKET ? Here are our before and after stories of this project that we hope to share with you. In January 2016, our customer feedback center colleague Sam feedback to the R &amp D team a common customer demand: Many customers and colleagues because of long-term sitting at the desk, driving a car, some lumbar pelvic surgery, and some long-term wheelchairs, many people feel very uncomfortable, and even lumbar pain, hope we can help them develop a product to relieve the pressure on the tailbone. At the same time our colleagues in the call center felt the same way, so on February 17, 2016 our team decided to form a Jason centric project team to find a solution to help everyone and our colleagues. In order to find the perfect solution, our market researcher Robin spent 60 days visiting orthopedic centers, nursing homes, truckers' clubs, aircrew clubs, rehabilitation centers, etc. to collect relevant data.

177 times design optimization April 1, 2016, the exciting moment finally began, our design team LAY led his colleagues, began to work on the design: After 177 design optimization, and after Dr. Leon's advice, we finally chose to use the U model tailbone part hollow cushion as our product shape. As the U-shaped hollow part will not touch the tailbone point of force, to avoid pressure on the tailbone. We all believe this is a very good idea! Our engineering department started to make the mold and after 10 times of improvement we finally produced a cushion with a size that fits most of our customers, but of course it doesn't fit all people, because it's hard to adjust to all people, right?

Ifoam was born Finally we worked with Dr. Leon Davis to confirm a perfect solution: the intention to design an ergonomic gel aero tailbone -memory foam cushion. We found the special memory foam used by NASA to protect astronauts and improved the density. After 37 experiments, we finally succeeded in developing a high-density aviation memory foam material that is comfortable, soft and supportive enough, and we defined it as Ifoam.

Cylen coccyx seat cushion was born After 180 days of hard work we finally designed a product that perfectly fits Sam's vision of CYLEN Ifoam. In May 2016, our customer feedback center colleague SAM and asked our cushion can not produce too much heat, and to be comfortable, the most important must be supportive and not flat, at the same time he also asked our R & D must take into account the convenience of carrying, to prevent sliding, etc., when he left our colleagues were broken! We all said his requirements were too much. But soon the collapse came again, he gave again to us to add 2 requirements: 1. Jacket convenient machine wash. 2.Free reason for return or replacement.

4.5 out of 5stars from more than 100,000 customers shopping experience sharing At the end of 2016, we launched a small-scale internal test version, at this time Sam he began to collect a lot of customer feedback: Through his after-sales research on the entire market products and customers, we were surprised to find that our tailbone cushion firmly occupies the position of the highest score of word of mouth, 4.5 out of 5 stars from more than 100,000 customers shopping experience sharing. We are the TOP 1! However, we are still 0.5 short of a perfect score, so we still need your shopping experience to help us keep improving! Please be generous with your shopping experience! Let's help those who need help! We'd appreciate it.

We need your help Please upgrade your sitting experience with the coccyx seat cushion CYLEN Always on the road, looking forward to walking with you. Maybe it is still not perfect, but I believe it is worth having! This is our CYLEN story and answer, looking forward to be your friend forever!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my second purchase of this cushion. It is very well made and so comfortable to sit on. The pad thickness does not wear down over time and the gel is evenly dispersed when sitting on the cushion so there is no lumpy feeling. This cushion provides very good stability for my lower back so that I can sit longer without back pain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great seat cushion!
reviews.reviewText: I've had this seat cushion for a few weeks, and have already used it so much. My tailbone and back tend to hurt after a while of sitting in harder seats, so this was a game changer. Very comfortable and well molded; keeps temperature well, too. The handle is convenient and the cushion is the perfect size. Overall, only positive things to say at this point; definitely worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the soft cover and handle. Still breaking it in but I think it definitely takes pressure of my spine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much more relief during long drives!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this seat cushion for my boyfriend whom had recently dealt with some medical issues and also has (NBAL) No butt at all syndrome 😅Anyways, he drives two hours for work each day and was really uncomfortable with sitting so long in the car.Oh how this cushion has made a difference in his commute! Unlike other cushions (because we've even gotten ones doctors recommended, you know, the butt donuts.) This one doesn't just flatten when you sit on it! It stays firm but also has enough give to cradle you. I've even used it for my long drives all over the country for work. No more post-roadtrip butt pain!Dislikes? None. He's had no complaints at all over it.Over-all, this cushion is perfect for his needs, and I am just as satisfied 😌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a Huge Upgrade
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend for Christmas, since he works from home and uses his computer all day. Previously, he was using they horribly flat and unsupportive pillow that was getting super ugly and slipped all over the place. I decided to try this new cushion and he’s so much happier! It’s super comfortable and makes sitting for long hours of the days much more relaxing. The best part, is the cushion actually has grips on the bottom to prevent and slipping and sliding and the foam doesn’t seem to flatten out over time/holds its’ form after use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A bit too firm
reviews.reviewText: Not as comfortable as I would have liked

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is definitely firm and took some getting used to. Before returning it though give it a solid week or two. I almost returned mine, butt decided to keep it. (See what I did there?) Once the warmth of your body settles down into it, it will cradle your arse like a swaddled baby. It also helps my posture and makes me sit up straight. Me bum don't fall asleep anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Firm seat which I like
reviews.reviewText: I broke my tailbone in a recent auto accident. I tried other cushions and many were too soft and didn't give me the support I needed. This cushion has been a huge help. I actually take it with me in the car and to work (basically, anywhere I know I'll be sitting for a length of time. I recommend this product.Side note: I'm a 6ft tall male; about 180 lbs; I've had the cushion approximately 1 month
Un Super Producto que me lo recomendaron los Médicos para proteger cuando se pasa mucho tiempo sentado
La calidad de los materiales son buenos. No está tan suave para que se deforme el sillón sin sacrificar confort. Me ha ayudado mucho en esta era del home office. Lo recomiendo

This cushion immediately changed my life! I did not have pain when I stood up from my chair for the first time in one whole year. Finally did something to help alleviate my tailbone pain. Seriously a game changer. Thank you.
Sin problemas y por mucho el mejor cojín que hay, yo me la paso al menos 12 horas en la computadora y con el me he sentido super cómodo
